title: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
plotSummary: Batman must face the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

title: Pulp Fiction
cast: John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman
plotSummary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Everything Everywhere All At Once
cast: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Ke Huy Quan
plotSummary: A middle-aged laundromat owner is swept up into an insane adventure across parallel universes.

title: Oppenheimer
cast: Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon
plotSummary: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb during World War II.

title: The Batman
cast: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Paul Dano
plotSummary: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family.

title: The Godfather
cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino
plotSummary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Interstellar
cast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
plotSummary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Forrest Gump
cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
plotSummary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Matrix
cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
plotSummary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Avengers: Endgame
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
plotSummary: The Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

title: Blade Runner 2049
cast: Ryan Gosling, Harrison Ford, Ana de Armas
plotSummary: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
plotSummary: A young hobbit, Frodo, is tasked with destroying a powerful ring to save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Saving Private Ryan
cast: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore
plotSummary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

title: Fight Club
cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
plotSummary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Inception
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
plotSummary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Green Mile
cast: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse
plotSummary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Intouchables
cast: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny
plotSummary: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: American History X
cast: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo
plotSummary: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
cast: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld
plotSummary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat.

title: Life Is Beautiful
cast: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini
plotSummary: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.
